org.cougaar.core.service
Interface QuiescenceReportService

All Superinterfaces:
Service
All Known Subinterfaces:
QuiescenceReportForDistributorService
public interface QuiescenceReportService
extends Service

This service is used by components to tell the node the initial quiescence numbering and to toggle between quiescence and non-quiescence.

"Quiescence" is partially a node-local concept, where all local agents have completed processing, and a society-wide concept, where all inter-agent messages have been delivered. The EventService is used to report node-local quiescence and incoming/outgoing message numbers to an external script that detects society-wide quiescence. Quiescence detection is primarily an execution-time planning tool used to advance the execution time (DemoControlService) past idle planning time (e.g. advance a day once all agents have planned the current day).

Usually blackboard activity is enough to detect quiescence, but a component that runs in a separate thread or queues work must often tell the node that the agent is non-quiescent even though blackboard activity has ceased.

Method Summary
 void clearQuiescentState()
          Specifies that this agent is no longer quiescent.
 void setAgentIdentificationService(AgentIdentificationService agentIdentificationService)

Method Detail

setAgentIdentificationService

void setAgentIdentificationService(AgentIdentificationService agentIdentificationService)
Specifies the client agent's identity using his AgentIdentificationService. This method must be called before any other method and establishes the identity of the client agent in a more or less unforgable way.

Parameters:
agentIdentificationService - the agent's identification service

setMessageNumbers

void setMessageNumbers(java.util.Map outgoingMessageNumbers,
                       java.util.Map incomingMessageNumbers)
Specify the maps of quiescence-relevant outgoing and incoming message numbers associated with a newly achieved state of quiescence. For efficiency, this method should be called before calling setQuiescentState().

Parameters:
outgoingMessageNumbers - a Map from agent MessageAddresses to Integers giving the number of the last message sent. The arguments must not be null.
incomingMessageNumbers - a Map from agent MessageAddresses to Integers giving the number of the last message received. The arguments must not be null.

setQuiescentState

void setQuiescentState()
Specifies that, from this service instance point-of-view, the agent is quiescent. The message number maps are not altered.

clearQuiescentState

void clearQuiescentState()
Specifies that this agent is no longer quiescent.
